Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class vrt::ThreadSafeQueue< T >

A basic implementation of a thread-safe queue.

template<typename T >
bool vrt::ThreadSafeQueue< T >::push ( T *  obj,
uint32_t  timeout 
) [inline]

Pushes an object reference onto the queue.

Blocks until free space is available on queue or timeout occurs, whichever happens first.

Parameters:
obj The object reference to put onto the queue.
timeout The timeout in ???.
Returns:
true if item pushed onto queue, false if not.
template<typename T >
void vrt::ThreadSafeQueue< T >::push ( T *  obj  )  [inline]

Pushes an object reference onto the queue.

Blocks until free space is available on queue.
